detaileddescription.para: enum values to represent Time constant of IIR filter supported by the Environmental sensor
This option could be used to disable data measurement
enum values to represent Oversampling supported by the Environmental sensor
no operation, all registers accessible, lowest power, selected after startup
perform one measurement, store results and return to sleep mode
perpetual cycling of measurements and inactive periods
This Specifies maximum number of enum elements and it is used only for error handling
enum values to represent Power Modes supported by the Environmental sensor
ID to represents bme280 environmental sensor
This Specifies maximum number of enum elements and it is used only for error handling
enum values to represent environmental types supported
enum values to represent StandbyTime(ms) supported by the Environmental sensor

briefdescription.para: Compensates temperature and relative humidity values.

detaileddescription.para: Compensates temperature and humidity values read using Environmental_readData() The result can be seen as the ambient values outside the sensor

simplesect.para: Please set an appropriate temperature offset value using the Environmental_setTemperatureOffset() function before using this API

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the environmental object
Parameter in which Temperature(mDegC),pressure(Pascal) and relative humidity (%rH) data from environmental sensor
Set compensateData success.
In case of NULL pointers arguments passed.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of trying to set invalid compensate data.

simplesect.para: The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: DeInitializes the environmental sensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the environmental object
Environmental De-initialization success.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of any other error refer Bme280Utils_uninitialize error codes.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Gets the power mode for the environmental sensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the environmental object
Last configured power mode of environmental sensor
Get power mode success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of getting power mode values other than Environmental_PowerModes_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bme280LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: reads the StandbyDuration for the environmental sensor

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the environmental object
Last configured Standby duration of environmental
Environmental get standby duration success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of NULL pointer arguments.
in case of getting standby duration values other than Environmental_StandbyTime_E

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bme280LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E

briefdescription.para: Initializes the environmental sensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the environmental sensor object
Environmental initialization success.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of any other error refer Bme280Utils_initialize error codes.
This function needs to be called before calling any other accelerometer API.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Reads and compensates temperature and relative humidity values.

detaileddescription.para: Reads and compensates temperature and humidity values The result can be seen as the ambient values outside the sensor

simplesect.para: Please set an appropriate temperature offset value using the Environmental_setTemperatureOffset() function before using this API

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the environmental object
Parameter in which Temperature(mDegC),pressure(Pascal) and relative humidity (%rH) data from environmental sensor
Read compensateData success.
In case of NULL pointers arguments passed.

simplesect.para: In case of other error code refer Environmental_readData or Environmental_compensateData API.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Reads Temperature in milli degree Celsius,pressure in Pascal and humidity in(%rh) values from the environmental sensor.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the environmental object
Parameter in which Temperature(mDegC),pressure(Pascal) and Humidity(%rh) data from environmental sensor
Environmental ReadData success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bme280LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Register the ambient temperature offset in millidegree Kelvin.

detaileddescription.para: Registers a temperature offset to be used by the temperature compensation API.
T_ambient = T_sensor + T_offset

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the environmental object
Parameter in which Temperature offset (mDegC) is given to be registered in the temperature compensation API
Set temperature offset success.
In case of NULL pointers arguments passed.
if called without initializing the sensor.

simplesect.para: The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Environmental Sensor Interface.

detaileddescription.para: The interface header exports advance Sensor API's which are used to Initialize Environmental sensor, Configure power Modes, Sleep Duration & Over sampling. Also has API's for reading sensor values & reading mode Settings.
